Title: Raise high the three red banners, trust science, rely on the collective, establish socialism
Designer: Science Popularization Press (科学普及出版社)
Publisher: Kexue puji chubanshe (科学普及出版社)
Notes: The image below of a group of peasants, workers, etc., is modelled on a poster published in Tianjin, July 1964, ''Go all out to make the country strong, hold initiative in your own hands and build up the fatherland".
